api_list.name: Percent of Elderly
api_list.description: Returns all data by percent of elderly people.

api_list.name: Percent of Children
api_list.description: Gets all data with a specific percentage of children.

api_list.name: Percent People of Color
api_list.description: Gets all data with a certain percent of people of color.

api_list.name: all
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://heat-sensitivity-api.p.rapidapi.com/all/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "heat-sensitivity-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://heat-sensitivity-api.p.rapidapi.com/all/{page}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "heat-sensitivity-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
